title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 125.8 - Annual filing and processing charge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 125.8 - Annual filing and processing charge

State Regulations

Each assuming insurer issued a certificate of recognition as either an accredited reinsurer, certified reinsurer, or reciprocal jurisdiction reinsurer shall pay to the superintendent an annual filing and processing charge of $2,000, to be paid on or before the first day of July. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11

125.8

Amended

New

York State Register September 29, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 39, eff. 9/29/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
